ValidationRule.description: Header record cannot have Chart of account or Detail associated with it
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(clcommon__Type__c,'HEADER'), OR( NOT(ISBLANK(clcommon__Detail__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(clcommon__Chart_of_Account__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(clcommon__Expression__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(clcommon__Alias__c)) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Record with type = HEADER must have blank Alias, Chart of Account , Detail or Expression
